Browse the source code of netbsd/external/lgpl3/gmp/dist/rand/randlc2s.c

1/* gmp_randinit_lc_2exp_size -- initialize a random state with a linear
2 congruential generator of a requested size.

31
32#include <stdio.h> /* for NULL */
33#include "gmp.h"
34#include "gmp-impl.h"
35
36
37/* Array of LC-schemes, ordered in increasing order of the first
38 member (the 'm2exp' value). The end of the array is indicated with
39 an entry containing all zeros. */
40
41/* All multipliers are in the range 0.01*m and 0.99*m, and are
42congruent to 5 (mod 8).
43They all pass the spectral test with Vt >= 2^(30/t) and merit >= 1.
44(Up to and including 196 bits, merit is >= 3.) */
45
46struct __gmp_rand_lc_scheme_struct
47{
48 unsigned long int m2exp; /* Modulus is 2 ^ m2exp. */
49 const char *astr; /* Multiplier in string form. */
50 unsigned long int c; /* Addend. */
51};
52
53static const struct __gmp_rand_lc_scheme_struct __gmp_rand_lc_scheme[] =
54{
55 {32, "29CF535", 1},
56 {33, "51F666D", 1},
57 {34, "A3D73AD", 1},
58 {35, "147E5B85", 1},
59 {36, "28F725C5", 1},
60 {37, "51EE3105", 1},
61 {38, "A3DD5CDD", 1},
62 {39, "147AF833D", 1},
63 {40, "28F5DA175", 1},
64 {56, "AA7D735234C0DD", 1},
65 {64, "BAECD515DAF0B49D", 1},
66 {100, "292787EBD3329AD7E7575E2FD", 1},
67 {128, "48A74F367FA7B5C8ACBB36901308FA85", 1},
68 {156, "78A7FDDDC43611B527C3F1D760F36E5D7FC7C45", 1},
69 {196, "41BA2E104EE34C66B3520CE706A56498DE6D44721E5E24F5", 1},
70 {200, "4E5A24C38B981EAFE84CD9D0BEC48E83911362C114F30072C5", 1},
71 {256, "AF66BA932AAF58A071FD8F0742A99A0C76982D648509973DB802303128A14CB5", 1},
72 {0, NULL, 0} /* End of array. */
73};
74
75int
76gmp_randinit_lc_2exp_size (gmp_randstate_t rstate, mp_bitcnt_t size)
77{
78 const struct __gmp_rand_lc_scheme_struct *sp;
79 mpz_t a;
80
81 /* Pick a scheme. */
82 for (sp = __gmp_rand_lc_scheme; sp->m2exp != 0; sp++)
83 if (sp->m2exp / 2 >= size)
84 goto found;
85 return 0;
86
87 found:
88 /* Install scheme. */
89 mpz_init_set_str (a, sp->astr, 16);
90 gmp_randinit_lc_2exp (rstate, a, sp->c, sp->m2exp);
91 mpz_clear (a);
92 return 1;
93}
94
